MUTH.1050Freshman Chorus0

MUEN.xxxxEnsembles2
MUTH.1080Musicianship & Analysis 15
MUHI.1040Musical Practices 11
ENGL.1010College Writing (Gen. Ed.)3
MATH.1510Explorations in Math (GE:Math)3
Total16

Course NumberCourse NameCredits

Total Minimum Credits = 129-131. 1Will need to be switched in alternate years. Please see advisor or Music Office for more specific requirements pertaining to Freshman Chorus, Recital Attendance, Applied Music, Ensembles and Internships. Refer to the General Education website for General Education requirements. Restriction on off-campus study: Be advised thatany course taken at another institution must be formally approvedprior to enrollment. See thecatalog policyfor details. Last updated: 6/12/2018. ## Quick Links - Request Information - Apply - Check Application Status - Visit
